title: Every adult in India is now eligible for Covid vaccine shots, but some states say they have none to offer
content:
1. Every adult in India is now eligible for Covid vaccine shots, but some states say they have none to offer  CNN
  2. India launches effort to inoculate all adults against COVID  Associated Press
  3. India running out of COVID-19 vaccines as record 400000 cases recorded  Sky News
  4. India's Serum Institute plans to start vaccine production outside India - The Times  Reuters
  5. India’s coronavirus surge creates vaccine supply turmoil far beyond its borders  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Every adult in India is now eligible for Covid vaccine shots, but some states say they have none to offer  CNN 
India launches effort to inoculate all adults against COVID  Associated Press
India running out of COVID-19 vaccines as record 400000 cases recorded  Sky News
India's Serum Institute plans to start vaccine production outside India - The Times  Reuters
India’s coronavirus surge creates vaccine supply turmoil far beyond its borders  The Washington Post
View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: インドではすべての成人がCovidワクチンの接種を受けることができるようになりましたが、一部の州では提供できるものがないとのことです。
印度的每个成年人现在都有资格注射科维德疫苗，但一些州说他们没有可提供的疫苗
印度的每個成年人現在都有資格注射科維德疫苗，但一些州說他們沒有可提供的疫苗
